feed.title: Mark Black
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: TV Series: To minore tis avgis

link.title: TV Series: To minore tis avgis

entry.content:
TV series "Το μινόρε της αυγής" ("To minore tis avgis") ran for 2 seasons in 1983 and 1984. Most of the main characters in the series are musicians, and so there is a lot of music in every episode. All episodes are available to watch at the ERT Archive. I have compiled a list of episodes with links to watch them at [Το μινόρε της αυγής][1]. Further, in the page for every episode I have noted the songs that play in that episode.
For some more information and cast details see [To minore tis avgis][2] on IMDB.
[1]: http://localhost:4000/tv-series/90b29f05-ec37-427c-b8fc-e09cdd4e28b3/?Το μινόρε της αυγής [2]: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0327334/
entry.summary: TV series “Το μινόρε της αυγής” (“To minore tis avgis”) ran for 2 seasons in 1983 and 1984. Most of the main characters in the series are musicians, and so there is a lot of music in every episode. All episodes are available to watch at the ERT Archive. I have compiled a list of episodes with links to watch them at Το μινόρε της αυγής. Further, in the page for every episode I have noted the songs that play in that episode.
